column4: i just turned on my PC after coming home from school to find out that my desktop has mysteriously resized itself to 640 x 480 and refuses to change to anything else
i recall that this could be a driver issue, but it was working fine before this and i don't remember how to check if my nvidia drivers are loaded
gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf and add in the extra resolutions you need? Or, try re-instaling you're drivers
that's for ATI and nVidia, check it out
